description:
A filterable list of checkbox/radio options
with an optional create button

props.name: autofocus
props.description: Sets the focus on this field when the form loads. Only the first field with this label gets

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID. The component `_uid` will be used as default.

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: ignore
props.description: Which terms to ignore when showing the create button

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum number of accepted tags

props.name: min
props.description: The minimum number of required tags

props.name: search
props.description: Whether to show the search input

props.name: create
props.description: Whether to show the create button

events.name: escape
events.description: Escape key was hit to close the list

events.name: create
events.description: New option shall be created from input
